author: Guy The Third
comment: He is such a badass character. I find there are three main ways of dealing with overpowered characters, 1 is goku who is one of fictions strongest fighters. What do you do with that? You make stronger villains so he has to continue to grow. Then thereâ€™s sitama, the strongest being shown in his anime/manga. What do you do? Make a joke out of it, make him being strong the joke of the entire series. Then thereâ€™s Escanar, again the strongest or one of the strongest being in his anime/manga. How they handle it is interesting, over the story we see as no one can even standup to him, except a few like meliodas and that one brother. They do both while handling him, they continue to show that he can be stronger while making it a joke and his personality be that he is the strongest , it makes him feel funny and intense at the same time. The first two are amazing but this is how you handle over powered characters, give them a bit of both
